create.title: Create a ServiceAccount
create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created

name.title: The name of the ServiceAccount
name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use. If not set and create is true, a name is derived using the release and chart names

create.title: Create K10 SSC
create.description: Whether to create a SecurityContextConstraints for K10 ServiceAccounts

create.title: Whether to create NetworkPolicies for the K10 services

repository.title: The helm repository for offline (airgapped) installation

storageClass.title: Persistent Volume global Storageclass
storageClass.description: If set to '-', dynamic provisioning is disabled. If undefined (the default) or set to null, the default provisioner is used. (e.g gp2 on AWS, standard on GKE, AWS & OpenStack)

size.title: Metering service Persistent Volume size
size.description: If not set, global.persistence.size is used

size.title: Catalog service Persistent Volume size
size.description: If not set, global.persistence.size is used.

size.description: If not set, global.persistence.size is used.

size.title: Logging service Persistent Volume size
size.description: If not set, global.persistence.size is used.

size.title: Grafana service Persistent Volume size
size.description: If not set, global.persistence.size is used.

imagePullSecret.description: Secret which contains docker config for private repository. Use `k10-ecr` when secrets.dockerConfigPath is used.

create.title: Whether the K10 dashboard should be exposed via ingress

enabled.title: Whether the K10 dashboard should be exposed via route
Whether the K10 dashboard should be exposed via route

insecureEdgeTerminationPolicy.title: What to do in case of an insecure traffic edge termination

create.title: whether the K10 dashboard should be exposed via ingress

enabled.title: Configures a TLS use for ingress.host

class.title: Cluster ingress controller class: nginx, GCE

pathType.title: the path type for the ingress resource

create.title: Whether to create Prometheus rbac configuration

storageClass.title: StorageClassName used to create Prometheus PVC
storageClass.description: Setting this option overwrites global StorageClass value

configMapOverrideName.title: Prometheus configmap name to override default generated name

baseURL.title: Prometheus external url path at which the server can be accessed

prefixURL.title: Prometheus prefix slug at which the server can be accessed

awsMarketplace.title: Set AWS cloud metering license mode

redhatMarketplacePayg.title: Set Red Hat cloud metering license mode

promoID.title: K10 promotion ID from marketing campaigns

clusterName.title: Cluster name for better logs visibility

executorReplicas.title: Number of executor service pod replicas for better performance

externalGateway.title: external gateway for K10 API services

fqdn.title: Host and domain name for the K10 API server

name.title: Domain name for the K10 API services

type.title: Supported gateway type: route53-mapper or external-dns

awsSSLCertARN.title: ARN for the AWS ACM SSL certificate used in the K10 API server

groupAllowList.title: A list of groups whose members are allowed access to K10's dashboard

basicAuth.title: Basic authentication for the K10 dashboard

secretName.title: Name of an existing Secret that contains a file generated with htpasswd

htpasswd.title: A username and password pair separated by a colon character

tokenAuth.title: Configuration for Token based authentication for the K10 dashboard

oidcAuth.title: Configuration for Open ID Connect based authentication for the K10 dashboard

redirectURL.title: URL to the K10 gateway service

scopes.title: Space separated OIDC scopes required for userinfo

prompt.title: The type of prompt to be used during authentication

clientID.title: Client ID given by the OIDC provider

clientSecret.title: Client secret given by the OIDC provider

usernameClaim.title: The claim to be used as the username

usernamePrefix.title: Prefix that has to be used with the username obtained from the username claim

groupClaim.title: Name of a custom OpenID Connect claim for specifying user groups

groupPrefix.title: All groups will be prefixed with this value to prevent conflicts

logoutURL.title: URL to your OIDC provider's logout endpoint

secretName.title: OIDC config based existing secret
secretName.description: Must include providerURL, redirectURL, scopes, clientID/secret and logoutURL

openshift.title: OpenShift OAuth server based authentication for K10 dashboard

serviceAccount.title: Name of the service account that represents an OAuth client

clientSecret.title: The token corresponding to the service account

dashboardURL.title: The URL used for accessing K10's dashboard

openshiftURL.title: The URL for accessing OpenShift's API server

insecureCA.title: To turn off SSL verification of connections to OpenShift

useServiceAccountCA.title: use the CA certificate corresponding to the Service Account

secretName.title: The Kubernetes Secret that contains OIDC settings

usernameClaim.title: The claim to be used as the username

usernamePrefix.title: Prefix that has to be used with the username obtained from the username claim

groupnameClaim.title: Name of a custom OpenID Connect claim for specifying user groups

ldap.title: Active Directory/LDAP based authentication for the K10 dashboard

restartPod.title: force a restart of the authentication service pod (useful when updating authentication config

dashboardURL.title: The URL used for accessing K10's dashboard

host.title: Host and optional port of the AD/LDAP server in the form `host:port`

insecureNoSSL.title: Set if the AD/LDAP host is not using TLS

insecureSkipVerifySSL.title: Turn off SSL verification of connections to the AD/LDAP host

startTLS.title: TLS protocol
startTLS.description: When set to true, ldap:// is used to connect to the server followed by creation of a TLS session. When set to false, ldaps:// is used.

bindDN.title: The Distinguished Name(username) used for connecting to the AD/LDAP host

bindPW.title: The password corresponding to the `bindDN` for connecting to the AD/LDAP host

bindPWSecretName.title: Secret name containing the password corresponding to the `bindDN` for connecting to the AD/LDAP host

baseDN.title: The base Distinguished Name to start the AD/LDAP search from

filter.title: Optional filter to apply when searching the directory

username.title: Attribute used for comparing user entries when searching the directory

idAttr.title: AD/LDAP attribute in a user's entry that should map to the user ID field in a token

emailAttr.title: AD/LDAP attribute in a user's entry that should map to the email field in a token

nameAttr.title: AD/LDAP attribute in a user's entry that should map to the name field in a token

preferredUsernameAttr.title: AD/LDAP attribute in a user's entry that should map to the preferred_username field in a token

baseDN.title: The base Distinguished Name to start the AD/LDAP group search from

filter.title: filter to apply when searching the directory for groups

userAttr.title: Attribute in the user's entry that must match with the groupAttr while searching for groups

groupAttr.title: Attribute in the group's entry that must match with the userAttr while searching for groups

userMatchers.title: List of field pairs that are used to match a user to a group

nameAttr.title: The AD/LDAP attribute that represents a group's name in the directory

secretName.title: The Kubernetes Secret that contains OIDC settings

usernameClaim.title: The claim to be used as the username

usernamePrefix.title: Prefix that has to be used with the username obtained from the username claim

groupnameClaim.title: Name of a custom OpenID Connect claim for specifying user groups

k10AdminUsers.title: A list of users who are granted admin level access to K10's dashboard

k10AdminGroups.title: A list of groups whose members are granted admin level access to K10's dashboard

cacertconfigmap.title: ConfigMap containing a certificate for a trusted root certificate authority

injectKanisterSidecar.title: Kanister sidecar injection for workload pods

matchLabels.title: Set of labels to select namespaces in which sidecar injection is enabled for workloads
Set of labels to filter workload objects in which the sidecar is injected

port.title: Port number on which the mutating webhook server accepts request

genericVolumeSnapshot.title: Generic Volume Snapshot restore pods config

memory.title: Generic Volume Snapshot restore pods memory request

cpu.title: Generic Volume Snapshot restore pods cpu request

memory.title: Generic Volume Snapshot restore pods memory limit

cpu.title: Generic Volume Snapshot restore pods cpu limit

hostNetwork.title: Whether the executor pods may use the node network
Whether the dashboardbff pods may use the node network

securityContext.title: Custom securityContext for K10 service containers

runAsUser.title: User ID K10 service containers run as

fsGroup.title: FSGroup that owns K10 service container volumes

hostNetwork.title: Whether the aggregatedapis pods may use the node network

serviceResolver.title: The resolver used for service discovery in the API gateway

genericVolumeSnapshots.title: Limit of concurrent generic volume snapshot create operations

genericVolumeCopies.title: Limit of concurrent generic volume snapshot copy operations

genericVolumeRestores.title: Limit of concurrent generic volume snapshot restore operations

csiSnapshots.title: Limit of concurrent CSI snapshot create operations

providerSnapshots.title: Limit of concurrent cloud provider create operations

insecureDisableSSLVerify.title: Whether to disable SSL verification for gateway pods

exposeAdminPort.title: Whether to expose Admin port for gateway service

backupTimeout.title: Timeout on Kanister backup operations in mins

restoreTimeout.title: Timeout for Kanister restore operations in mins

deleteTimeout.title: timeout for Kanister delete operations in mins

hookTimeout.title: Timeout for Kanister pre-hook and post-hook operations

podReadyWaitTimeout.title: Timeout for Kanister tooling pods to be ready during operations

assumeRoleDuration.title: Duration of a session token generated by AWS for an IAM role
assumeRoleDuration.description: The minimum value is 15 minutes and the maximum value is the maximum duration setting for that IAM role. For documentation about how to view and edit the maximum session duration for an IAM role see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_roles_use.html#id_roles_use_view-role-max-session. The value accepts a number along with a single character 'm'(for minutes) or 'h' (for hours)  Examples: 60m or 2h

efsBackupVaultName.title: the AWS EFS backup vault name

primaryKey.title: primaryKey is used for enabling encryption of K10 primary key

awsCmkKeyId.title: Ensures AWS CMK is used for encrypting K10 primary key
